title: E96 A Garden in the Rear and a Rejection from ISIS
description:
This week, #ChristineGetsBelized so we've decided to release a live episode. In our first stop on our East Coast tour, Em covers DC's Octagon House and Christine covers Virginia's Selfie Killer. And that's why we drink! 
Please support the companies that support us! 
Visit prettylitter.com and use promo code DRINK for 20% off your first order. 
To get your FREE 11x14 Canvas People canvas text WWD to 484848. 
Go to fabfitfun.com and use promo code DRINK for $10 off your first box.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
